p: Cervicovaginal swabs were collected from all participants by a gynecologist according to the standard operation procedure for sampling at the recruitment sites. Cervical specimens were collected in PreservCyt ® Solution, the ThinPrep ® Pap Test preservation system, using a broom-type device (e.g., Rovers Cervex ® Brush, Wallach Papette ® ), or Endocervical Brush/Spatula. The cervical specimens were stored at room temperature (20-30°C) in PreservCyt ® Solution prior to testing. All samples were shipped to the lab for HPV testing within 24 hours.
